update wisdom_park_talent
talent_name = #{talentName,jdbcType=CHAR},
talent_identity = #{talentIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_education_degree = #{talentEducationDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graduate_school = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
graduate_major = #{graduateMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_address = #{talentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
registered_residence = #{registeredResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enterprise_belong = #{enterpriseBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_full_time = #{isFullTime,jdbcType=CHAR},
talent_plan_level = #{talentPlanLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_plan_name = #{talentPlanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_plan_start_time = #{talentPlanStartTime,jdbcType=DATE},
talent_plan_period = #{talentPlanPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position_x = #{positionX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position_y = #{positionY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR},
create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE},
enterprise_address=#{enterpriseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
talent_portrait=#{talentPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update wisdom_park_talent set talent_name = #{talentName,jdbcType=CHAR}, talent_identity = #{talentIdentity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_education_degree = #{talentEducationDegree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduate_school = #{graduateSchool,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, graduate_major = #{graduateMajor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_address = #{talentAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, registered_residence = #{registeredResidence,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enterprise_belong = #{enterpriseBelong,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_full_time = #{isFullTime,jdbcType=CHAR}, talent_plan_level = #{talentPlanLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_plan_name = #{talentPlanName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_plan_start_time = #{talentPlanStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, talent_plan_period = #{talentPlanPeriod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_x = #{positionX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position_y = #{positionY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_id = #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=DATE}, enterprise_address=#{enterpriseAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, talent_portrait=#{talentPortrait,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update wisdom_park_talent set is_deleted = '1' where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select graduate_major as type,count(id) as count from wisdom_park_talent where is_deleted = '0' group by graduate_major

select ifnull(count(id),0) as count,YEAR(talent_plan_start_time) as type from wisdom_park_talent where talent_plan_start_time between str_to_date ('2010-01-01 00:00:00', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and str_to_date ('2019-12-31 23:59:59', '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and is_deleted = '0' GROUP BY YEAR(talent_plan_start_time)
